subject: Ebay store
description_text:
Hi, I've purchased through what's advertised as your official store. Is
this correct ?

Regards

Rob Cross

conversations.body_text: Hi Robert Cr,    You can purchase through our official eBay store without any problem.

Ok, thank you.

I ordered the P3-H3 and assume that the H3 is haptic packs x3 ?

On Mon, 3 Nov 2025, 11:29 am service@simsonn.com,
Hi Robert Cr,  H3 represents three hydraulic rods and does not include the haptic motor.Â
